text: Casa de l'Aigua is a station on line 11 of the Barcelona Metro. Built in 2003, this single-platform station has a single level access opening onto Carrer Aiguablava. ==See also== *List of Barcelona Metro stations ==External links== *Casa de l'Aigua (trenscat.cat) Category:Railway stations opened in 2003 Category:Transport in Nou Barris
title: Casa de l'Aigua (Barcelona Metro)
